reviewText: Wasn't quit as good as I thought it would be, but was still entertaining.  Would not be amoung my favorites

Brand new on DVD, this is a remastered version of two of my most popular short films, "FEDORA" (winner of the CINE "Golden Eagle") and "WILDEST DREAMS" (my graduate thesis film that was nominated for a student Academy Award), both of which are currently available on VHS on Amazon.com, but which we've transferred to DVD, with a new, lower price.

For details and reviews of either film, search for "Fedora" or "Wildest Dreams" in the VHS category on Amazon.com.
